body:
I want to see a game mode where you are a poro and everyone is having a snowfight!

Ideas for skills:

- Snowballs that deal 50% true damage to life when hit.
- Snow wall that blocks 3 projectiles.
- Lick an icicle, restores 50% of life as true heal, grants movement speed but can't use abilities for 3 seconds.
- Grand gift, brings all the enemy poros to the gift and heals everyone and then it stuns everyone it healed for 1.5 seconds. (Those with full health won't be stunned.)
- Yellow snow, slows enemies for 50% in an area around you. (Poros get scared too...)
- Make a snowman. It requires 3 snowballs and after it's complete, it comes to life to attack enemies. Enemies can destroy it with one snowball if the snowman is not complete, if the snowman is complete, it requires two shots.

The map would look like an arena with not to many places to dodge. It will be decorated, seasonal songs, small Poros are gathered around to watch it, like in the old times when people went to the Arena! But, here everyone is happy, no one is hurt, they go back to clean the snow and come back.

Watch out, some of the crowd might throw biscuits at the Poros! (Extended time with no food makes a Poro hungry.)
